name: ZX Destroyer
overview: Eliminate all the hordes of enemies to reach GREENFACE himself, a disgusting being that dominates the galaxy. Your only help is to get the best result to get the best prize during the battle. You can also get all the trophies and thus discover the hidden trophy. Good luck Destroyer... Get rid of all the enemy waves to reach the battle against GREENFACE , a disgusting being who rules the galaxy. Your only help will be to get the best result to get the best price during the battle. You can also get all the trophies in order to unveil the hidden trophy. Good luck, Destroyer...
